pr_title: DHFPROD-4659: Document metadata of the document to visualize in card view

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4659: Document metadata of the document to visualize in card view

timeline.bodyText: Let's call this "HubMetadata", as it's not all specific to when the document was last processed - for example, the sources are not specific to that concept.
timeline.author: rjrudin
